item.title: Lisa add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "You're going to burn in a very special level of hell. A level they reserve for child molesters and people who talk at the theater." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Lisa add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "I am simply a 'book drunkard.' Books have the same irresistible temptation for me that liquor has for its devotee. I cannot withstand them." -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Lisa add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "True friends are always together in spirit. (Anne Shirley)" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Lucy Maud Montgomery
item.description: "Miss Barry was a kindred spirit after all," Anne confided to Marilla, "You wouldn't think so to look at her, but she is. . . Kindred spirits are not so scarce as I used to think. It's splendid to find out there are so many of them in the world." -- Lucy Maud Montgomery

item.title: Lisa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lisa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I am a product [...of] endless books. My father bought all the books he read and never got rid of any of them. There were books in the study, books in the drawing room, books in the cloakroom, books (two deep) in the great bookcase on the landing, books in a bedroom, books piled as high as my shoulder in the cistern attic, books of all kinds reflecting every transient stage of my parents' interest, books readable and unreadable, books suitable for a child and books most emphatically not. Nothing was forbidden me. In the seemingly endless rainy afternoons I took volume after volume from the shelves. I had always the same certainty of finding a book that was new to me as a man who walks into a field has of finding a new blade of grass." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lisa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "He'll be coming and going" he had said. "One day you'll see him and another you won't. He doesn't like being tied down--and of course he has other countries to attend to. It's quite all right. He'll often drop in. Only you mustn't press him. He's wild, you know. Not like a tame lion." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "People love a happy ending. So every episode, I will explain once again that I don't like people. And then Mal will shoot someone. Someone we like. And their puppy." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Lisa add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "Always be on the lookout for the presence of wonder." -- E.B. White

item.title: Lisa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "No book is really worth reading at the age of ten which is not equally – and often far more – worth reading at the age of fifty and beyond." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Kind people have a way of working their way inside me and rooting there." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You don’t forget the face of the person who was your last hope." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Richard Castle
item.description: "There are two kinds of folks who sit around thinking about how to kill people: psychopaths and mystery writers." -- Richard Castle

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Ally Condie
item.description: "Every minute you spend with someone gives them a part of your life and takes part of theirs." -- Ally Condie

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Ally Condie
item.description: "Growing apart doesn't change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side; our roots will always be tangled. I'm glad for that." -- Ally Condie

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "It takes ten times as long to put yourself back together as it does to fall apart." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "Sometimes you make choices in life and sometimes choices make you." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "You just work through it. You just hang in there." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "For Harry Potter I have all the time in the world." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I would always rather be happy than dignified." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Laura Miller
item.description: "The first book we fall in love with shapes us every bit as much as the first person we fall in love with..." -- Laura Miller

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Laura Miller
item.description: "because we all know that the books we’ve loved best are seldom the ones we esteem the most highly" -- Laura Miller

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Kate Langley Bosher
item.description: "As long as I am on this little planet I expect to love a lot of people and I hope they will love me in return." -- Kate Langley Bosher

item.title: Lisa add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "That is part of the beauty of all literature. You discover that your longings are universal longings, that you're not lonely and isolated from anyone. You belong." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "The more you know who you are, and what you want, the less you let things upset you." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I love you as certain dark things are loved, secretly, between the shadow and the soul." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I wish for the thing that is best for me." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I don't want to feel this way around him. I want things to be normal. I want to be his friend, not another stupid girl holding out for something that will never happen." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I don't understand why things always go from perfect to weird with us. It's like we're incapable of normal human interaction." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "There are few things worse than having feelings for someone you shouldn't, and I don't like where my thoughts were headed." -- Stephanie Perkins
